# Site entry for LLMs

# Notes:
# - This site is optimized for clients that can only read the first ~10k tokens per request.
# - Prefer small indexes (shards_index / resolve_meta) and then jump directly to core text.

- DB portal (recommended first): /html-preview/llms.txt

- Tax law (statutes/regs): /html-preview/ai-law-db/quickstart.txt
- Tax law dataset map: /html-preview/ai-law-db/llms.txt
- Corporate-tax article titles (resolve_meta_corp): /html-preview/ai-law-db/data/resolve_meta_corp/index.json
- Fast article titles (resolve_meta): /html-preview/ai-law-db/data/resolve_meta/index.json

- Tax circulars (tsutatsu): /html-preview/ai-tsutatsu-db/llms.txt

- Tax cases/rulings: /html-preview/ai-hanketsu-db/quickstart.txt

- Papers/guidelines (international tax): /html-preview/ai-paper-db/llms.txt
- Paper corpus (OECD TPG 2022): /html-preview/ai-paper-db/oecd-tpg-2022/quickstart.txt
- Paper corpus (NTA TP audit): /html-preview/ai-paper-db/nta-tp-audit/quickstart.txt

- Tax treaties: /html-preview/ai-treaty-db/llms.txt
- Treaty corpus (JP tax treaties, major jurisdictions): /html-preview/ai-treaty-db/jp-tax-treaties/quickstart.txt

- Tax KB prototype: /html-preview/tax-kb/quickstart.txt
